page.title: 14SANDFIELD HOUSE FARM
page.content: Sandfield House Farm. { """"""""""""""""""""""""" Sandfield House is a mixed farm worked by Mr.Fred Crossland and his brother Jeff. The Crossland family have rented the farm for{32}years; this has taken them through{3}generations.Brian, who is{14,}won many prizes at the {1985 Flower show and hopes to take over the farm from his uncles.The farm has{75 acres of land scattered around East Bridgford. Wheat,barley,sugarbeet and potatoes are the main crops, and several acres are used for market gardening.There are{40}pigs,{25 cattle,{4}sheep,{1}horse and{1}goat along with hens,ducks geese,guinea pigs and assorted fowl. The Crossland brothers are also successful breeders of racing pigeons. {...................................... {||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
